scripts.test: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat test
scripts.serve: yarn env:local && export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat node
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.deploy:local: yarn env:local && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.local.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn env:mumbai && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.mumbai.ts --network mumbai
scripts.deploy:topos: yarn env:topos && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.topos.ts --network topos
